segments.source_content:
---
title: Changelogs in Pull Requests
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: The changelog entry in your pull request serves as a sort of "tl;dr:" for your changes: do they affect Android? are these breaking changes? is something new being added?

translations.zh-hant: 您的拉取請求中的變更日誌條目可視為變更的「簡要說明」：這些變更是否影響 Android？是否為重大變更？是否有新增功能？

segments.source_content: Providing a changelog using a standardized format helps release coordinators write release notes. Please include a changelog as part of your pull request description. Your pull request description will be used as the commit message should the pull request get merged.

translations.zh-hant: 使用標準化格式提供變更日誌有助於發布協調者撰寫發布說明。請在拉取請求描述中包含變更日誌。若拉取請求被合併，您的描述將作為提交訊息使用。

segments.source_content: ### Format

translations.zh-hant: ### 格式

segments.source_content: A changelog entry has the following format

translations.zh-hant: 變更日誌條目需遵循以下格式：

segments.source_content:
```
## Changelog:

[Category] [Type] - Message
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b9c7a144

segments.source_content: The "Category" field may be one of:

translations.zh-hant: 「類別」欄位可為以下之一：

segments.source_content:
- **Android**, for changes that affect Android.
- **iOS**, for changes that affect iOS.
- **General**, for changes that do not fit any of the other categories.
- **Internal**, for changes that would not be relevant to developers consuming the release notes.

translations.zh-hant:
- **Android**：影響 Android 的變更。
- **iOS**：影響 iOS 的變更。
- **General**：不屬於其他類別的變更。
- **Internal**：與開發者無關的內部變更。

segments.source_content: The "Type" field may be one of:

translations.zh-hant: 「類型」欄位可為以下之一：

segments.source_content:
- **Breaking**, for breaking changes.
- **Added**, for new features.
- **Changed**, for changes in existing functionality.
- **Deprecated**, for soon-to-be removed features.
- **Removed**, for now removed features.
- **Fixed**, for any bug fixes.
- **Security**, in case of vulnerabilities.

translations.zh-hant:
- **Breaking**：重大變更。
- **Added**：新增功能。
- **Changed**：現有功能變更。
- **Deprecated**：即將移除的功能。
- **Removed**：已移除的功能。
- **Fixed**：錯誤修復。
- **Security**：安全性修補。

segments.source_content: Finally, the "Message" field may answer "what and why" on a feature level. Use this to briefly tell React Native users about notable changes.

translations.zh-hant: 最後，「訊息」欄位需簡要說明「變更內容與原因」，讓 React Native 使用者了解重要變更。

segments.source_content: For more detail, see [How do I make a good changelog?](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/#how) and [Why keep a changelog?](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/#why)

translations.zh-hant: 更多細節請參閱：[如何撰寫好的變更日誌？](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/#how) 與 [為何需要維護變更日誌？](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/#why)

segments.source_content: ### Examples

translations.zh-hant: ### 範例

segments.source_content:
- `[General] [Added] - Add snapToOffsets prop to ScrollView component`
- `[General] [Fixed] - Fix various issues in snapToInterval on ScrollView component`
- `[iOS] [Fixed] - Fix crash in RCTImagePicker`

translations.zh-hant:
- `[General] [Added] - Add snapToOffsets prop to ScrollView component`
- `[General] [Fixed] - Fix various issues in snapToInterval on ScrollView component`
- `[iOS] [Fixed] - Fix crash in RCTImagePicker`

segments.source_content: ### FAQ

translations.zh-hant: ### 常見問題

segments.source_content: #### What if my pull request contains changes to both Android and JavaScript?

translations.zh-hant: #### 若我的拉取請求同時包含 Android 和 JavaScript 的變更？

segments.source_content: Use the Android category.

translations.zh-hant: 請使用 Android 類別。

segments.source_content: #### What if my pull request contains changes to both Android and iOS?

translations.zh-hant: #### 若我的拉取請求同時包含 Android 和 iOS 的變更？

segments.source_content: Use the General category if the change is made in a single pull request.

translations.zh-hant: 若變更透過單一拉取請求提交，請使用 General 類別。

segments.source_content: #### What if my pull request contains changes to Android, iOS, and JavaScript?

translations.zh-hant: #### 若我的拉取請求同時包含 Android、iOS 和 JavaScript 的變更？

segments.source_content: Use the General category if the change is made in a single pull request.

translations.zh-hant: 若變更透過單一拉取請求提交，請使用 General 類別。

segments.source_content: #### What if...?
Any changelog entry is better than none. If you are unsure if you have picked the right category, use the "message" field to succinctly describe your change.

translations.zh-hant: 任何變更日誌條目都比沒有好。若不確定類別是否正確，請在「訊息」欄位簡潔描述變更內容。

segments.source_content: These entries are used by the [`@rnx-kit/rn-changelog-generator`](https://github.com/microsoft/rnx-kit/tree/main/incubator/rn-changelog-generator) script to build a rough draft, which is then edited by a release coordinator.

translations.zh-hant: 這些條目會由 [`@rnx-kit/rn-changelog-generator`](https://github.com/microsoft/rnx-kit/tree/main/incubator/rn-changelog-generator) 腳本用於建立草稿，再由發布協調者編輯。

segments.source_content: Your notes will be used to add your change to the correct location in the final release notes.

translations.zh-hant: 您的說明將用於將變更正確歸類至最終發布說明中。
